title: Iowa passes most restrictive abortion ban in U.S.
text:
Iowa passes most restrictive abortion ban in U.S. 2:18pm EDT - 01:07
Iowa’s Republican-controlled legislature passed the most restrictive abortion ban in the United States on Wednesday, outlawing the procedure after a fetal heartbeat is detected, often at six weeks and before a woman realizes she is pregnant.
Iowa’s Republican-controlled legislature passed the most restrictive abortion ban in the United States on Wednesday, outlawing the procedure after a fetal heartbeat is detected, often at six weeks and before a woman realizes she is pregnant. //reut.rs/2FBX0Tj
